author: John Barrowman
method: Combine all the prepared vegetables in a salad bowl. In a separate bowl, toss the cooked duck pieces in the hoisin sauce. Place the hoisin duck on top of the salad and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Serve at once.
ingredients: 4 carrots, cut into thin strips,  1 bunch spring onions, cut into thin strips,  Â½ cucumber, seeds removed, cut into thin strips,  1 crisp lettuce, such as cos or iceberg, sliced,  2 pre-cooked duck breasts, shredded into small slices,  hoisin sauce, from a jar, to taste,  handful sesame seeds
